required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Acute Effect of a Standardized Botanical Blend Rich in Polyphenols on Cognitive Functions in Healthy Students
clinical_study.official_title: Acute Effect of a Standardized Botanical Blend Rich in Polyphenols on Cognitive Functions in Healthy Students: Randomized, Placebo-controlled, Double-blind, Cross-over Clinical Trial

collaborator.agency: CIC SANPSY (USR CNRS 3413), Hôpital Pellegrin, Bordeaux, FRANCE

brief_summary.textblock:
Available literature suggests that flavanols-rich foods, and more especially monomeric flavanols-rich foods such as grape, can have an acute effect on cognitive functions via different mechanisms such as cerebral blood flow improvement.
The objective of this study is to investigate the effect of a Standardized botanical blend rich in polyphenols (SBRP), on cognitive functions, together with endothelial function in healthy students. Moreover, in order to provide supportive evidence on the mechanisms and biological plausibility to the clinical effects of the product, appropriate biological parameters and circulating metabolites will be assayed.
The study design will be a double-blind, randomised, placebo controlled, crossover study. A total of 30 healthy volunteers will be included. Each participant will receive a single dose of SBRP and placebo capsules, during 2 separate experimental visits and in a counterbalanced order. There will be a 1 week washout period between the 2 experimental visits. During each experimental visit, after a training battery volunteers will be administered a cognitive test battery (COMPASS) before product intake (baseline, B0) and 6 times after product intake (B1 to B6, from 90 min post-dose to 160 min post-dose).

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: The primary endpoint is the change (difference B4-B0) in the number of correct answers during the Serial Three Subtraction task (Serial Three) between the baseline battery (B0) and the 4th repetition of the battery after product intake (B4).
primary_outcome.time_frame: B0= baseline (before product administration); B4=120 min post-dose
primary_outcome.description: The Serial Three task will be administered through the computerized COMPASS battery (" Computerised Mental Performance Assessment System "). Serial subtraction tasks rely on working memory (executive function).

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in the number of correct responses from the Serial Three Subtraction task between the baseline battery (B0) and each of the repetitions N°1, 2, 3, 5 and 6 of the battery after product intake
secondary_outcome.time_frame: B0= baseline (before product administration); B1 to B6: test battery repeated 6 times from 90 min to 160 min post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: Differences B1-B0, B2-B0, B3-B0, B5-B0 and B6-B0;

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in the number of errors from the Serial Three Subtraction task (Serial Three, COMPASS battery) between the baseline battery (B0) and each of the repetitions of the battery after product intake (B1 to B6);
secondary_outcome.time_frame: B0= baseline (before product administration); B1 to B6: test battery repeated 6 times from 90 min to 160 min post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: Differences B1-B0, B2-B0, B3-B0, B5-B0 and B6-B0;

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in the number of correct responses from the Serial Sevens Subtraction task (Serial Sevens, COMPASS battery) between the baseline battery (B0) and each of the repetitions of the battery after product intake (B1 to B6);
secondary_outcome.time_frame: B0= baseline (before product administration); B1 to B6: test battery repeated 6 times from 90 min to 160 min post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: Differences B1-B0, B2-B0, B3-B0, B5-B0 and B6-B0;

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in the number of errors from the Serial Sevens Subtraction task (Serial Sevens, COMPASS battery) between the baseline battery (B0) and each of the repetitions of the battery after product intake (B1 to B6);
secondary_outcome.time_frame: B0= baseline (before product administration); B1 to B6: test battery repeated 6 times from 90 min to 160 min post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: Differences B1-B0, B2-B0, B3-B0, B5-B0 and B6-B0;

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in the reaction time from the RVIP test (" Rapid Visual Information Processing ", COMPASS battery), in milliseconds (ms) between the baseline battery (B0) and each of the repetitions of the battery after product intake (B1 to B6);
secondary_outcome.time_frame: B0= baseline (before product administration); B1 to B6: test battery repeated 6 times from 90 min to 160 min post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: Differences B1-B0, B2-B0, B3-B0, B5-B0 and B6-B0;

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in the percentage of correct responses from the RVIP test (COMPASS battery) between the baseline battery (B0) and each of the repetitions of the battery after product intake (B1 to B6);
secondary_outcome.time_frame: B0= baseline (before product administration); B1 to B6: test battery repeated 6 times from 90 min-dose to 160 min post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: Differences B1-B0, B2-B0, B3-B0, B5-B0 and B6-B0;

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in the number of false alarms from the RVIP test (COMPASS battery) between the baseline battery (B0) and each of the repetitions of the battery after product intake (B1 to B6);
secondary_outcome.time_frame: B0= baseline (before product administration); B1 to B6: test battery repeated 6 times from 90 min-dose to 160 min post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: Differences B1-B0, B2-B0, B3-B0, B5-B0 and B6-B0;

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in the score of mental fatigue (COMPASS battery self-assessment using a Visual Analogue Scale) between the baseline battery (B0) and each of the repetitions of the battery after product intake (B1 to B6);
secondary_outcome.time_frame: B0= baseline (before product administration); B1 to B6: test battery repeated 6 times from 90 min-dose to 160 min post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: Differences B1-B0, B2-B0, B3-B0, B5-B0 and B6-B0;

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in the score of anxiety (COMPASS battery, VAS) between the baseline battery (B0) and each of the repetitions of the battery after product intake (B1 to B6);
secondary_outcome.time_frame: B0= baseline (before product administration); B1 to B6: test battery repeated 6 times from 90 min to 160 min post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: Differences B1-B0, B2-B0, B3-B0, B5-B0 and B6-B0;

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in the score of vigilance/ alertness (COMPASS battery, VAS) between the baseline battery (B0) and each of the repetitions of the battery after product intake (B1 to B6);
secondary_outcome.time_frame: B0= baseline (before product administration); B1 to B6: test battery repeated 6 times from 90 min to 160 min post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: Differences B1-B0, B2-B0, B3-B0, B5-B0 and B6-B0;

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in the score of cognitive performances (COMPASS battery, VAS) between the baseline battery (B0) and each of the repetitions of the battery after product intake (B1 to B6);
secondary_outcome.time_frame: B0= baseline (before product administration); B1 to B6: test battery repeated 6 times from 90 min to 160 min post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: Differences B1-B0, B2-B0, B3-B0, B5-B0 and B6-B0;

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of correct responses at the immediate free recall test before the first repetition of the test battery (B1) ;
secondary_outcome.description: Number of words properly recalled, among a list of 20 words, with no clue

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of correct responses at the delayed free recall test, after the last repetition of the test battery (B6) ;
secondary_outcome.description: Number of words properly recalled, among a list of 20 words, with no clue

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of correct responses at the delayed recognition task, after the last repetition of the test battery (B6) ;
secondary_outcome.description: Number of words properly recognized among a list of 20 words containing 10 words from the original list and 10 distractors

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes between the values measured in fasting conditions and those measured after the end of the cognitive assessments in flow-mediated dilation (FMD)
secondary_outcome.description: Post-ischemic increase of brachial artery diameter, in % of the pre-ischemic diameter

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes between the values measured in fasting conditions and those measured after the end of the cognitive assessments (i.e. 3 hours after product intake) in basal diameter of brachial artery;

arm_group.description: Food supplement in hard gelatin capsule form containing a Standardized botanical blend rich in polyphenols (SBRP)
Hard gelatin capsule form containing maltodextrin, with the same appearance as SBRP capsules
